alert.note: Alert for Craig; Delaware; Mayes; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 12:02PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Craig, northern Delaware, southern Ottawa and northeastern Mayes Counties through 1230 PM CST... At 1201 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pensacola to 2 miles northeast of Chloeta. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny to nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Jay... Grove... Fairland... Afton... Langley... Bernice... Ketchum... Disney... Pensacola... Honey Creek State Park... Cherokee State Park... Bernice State Park... Cleora... Chloeta... Dodge... Cayuga... Disney Little Blue State Park... Zena... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 290 and 302. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
